title: Retro Fighters Blockbuster VHS Mini Game Case for Nintendo Switch Review !
description:
Find one at Stone Age Gamer: https://lon.tv/gylxt (compensated affiliate link) - Retrofighters released a very authentic looking (and officially licensed) mini VHS game case for Nintendo Switch. It consists of a realistic looking Blockbuster box and a faux mini VHS tape that opens up to hold 12 Switch games and 4 microSD cards. See more retro: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIswkmY7xCvaH3K_78rUsEIO and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s
